fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers, Mappa Mare, Favonious Codex

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Viridescent Venerer <:4x:957694032216215573>
• Anemo DMG Bonus +15%
• Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Wanderer's Troupe <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.
• Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or a Bow.

fields.name: Third Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Noblesse Oblige <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Elemental Burst DMG +20%.
• Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.
